definitions.definition: That satisfies , gratifies or pleases ; that removes any feeling of lack .
Pleasing to certain sensory channels in neurocognition , especially auditory and tactile ones synesthetically via ASMR .

main_definition: That satisfies , gratifies or pleases ; that removes any feeling of lack .
secondary_definitions: Pleasing to certain sensory channels in neurocognition , especially auditory and tactile ones synesthetically via ASMR .
